technical_skills: Basic software system design and API integration
Prompt engineering (embeddings, vector search, chatbots, agentic AI)

Interest or experience in GenAI workflows

Build scalable tools and streamline business processes
education_requirements: Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence or related field
nice_to_have: Experience with multiple cloud platforms (Azure, AWS, or GCP)
Exposure to data pipelines or databases

compensation.additional_compensation: Monthly Spark credit, Spark share scheme

benefits: Wellness coaches, EAP, in-house clinical support

diversity_inclusion: Embedded into day-to-day activities and business practices; inclusive culture

gaps: Limited hands-on experience with large-scale cloud services

score_explanation: Candidate has relevant AI skills and a background in Python.

Overall, a good fit for a junior to intermediate AI engineering role.
